summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, amending sections 21.04.060, 21.04.100, 21.04.110, and 21.04.120 of the Seattle Municipal Code to revise conditions of water service connection, authorize the Superintendent to enter into watermain extension agreements, provide for credits to special tap charges for certain non-abutting properties; and establish revised special tap charges for properties connecting to standard mains replacing sub-standard mains.
